en.title: Make (Integromat) Automation Services
en.name: Make
en.descriptionV1: Automate complex workflows with Make's visual builder and powerful scenario engine.
en.descriptionV2: We orchestrate Make scenarios that synchronize data across SaaS platforms, APIs, and on-prem systems.
en.additionalDescription: Our team implements governance, monitoring, and documentation to keep your Make automations reliable and auditable.

features.title: Visual Scenario Builder
features.description: Design automation pipelines through a drag-and-drop interface with branching logic.

features.title: Extensive Connectors
features.description: Access hundreds of modules or integrate custom APIs to tailor every workflow.

features.title: Error Handling
features.description: Implement retries, conditional paths, and notifications to make workflows resilient.

features.title: Scalable Operations
features.description: Optimize performance and costs with scenario templates, scheduling, and analytics.

process.title: Automation Audit
process.description: Identify processes, data sync needs, and opportunities for Make adoption.

process.title: Scenario Architecture
process.description: Design reusable modules, error strategies, and security controls.

process.title: Implementation
process.description: Build and test scenarios that connect systems and automate manual tasks.

process.title: Validation & Monitoring
process.description: Simulate edge cases, configure alerts, and review metrics for reliability.

process.title: Training & Evolution
process.description: Document patterns, coach stakeholders, and refine automations over time.
